commenter_b: Anthony - Huh? Who proposed that? If you're not a citizen, you don't get to vote. If undocumented get amnesty (which can only be done by Congress), that doesn't necessarily make them a citizen. If we decide (via legislation) they should have a path to citizenship, then citizens get to vote. Your comment makes no sense, and is a total strawman.
